name: Splitted - Mini Jam 121
description:
Splitted is a puzzle game based on the concept of reflection created by two independent French creators. 

First the puzzle game is a kind of video game that invites the player to think to find the answer. Secondly the game works with light arrows reflecting on mirrors. 

Move with the W key, interact with the environment with the X key, travel from one dimension to another with the spacebar key and shoot with the left click of your mouse. 

Game design / Game development : Etienne Dufour 

Graphics / UI / Animation / Sound design : Matéo Lemetayer
